AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Copy Credit Card Add Data Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Add form to launch the copy credit card feature.
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SaveImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_COPYCREDITCARD ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @REVENUELOOKUPID nvarchar(100) = '' ) as
set nocount on;
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try -- call the sproc to do the work if @REVENUELOOKUPID is not null exec dbo.USR_USP_COPYCREDITCARD @revenueId = @CONTEXTID, -- this is passed in from the form as context of the recurring gift user is "sitting on", it's CC will be replaced @revenueLookupId = @REVENUELOOKUPID -- this is the value the user entered into the form else raiserror 1000000 'You must enter a Revenue Lookup Id value, otherwise click the Cancel button.'
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0

common:FormField.Caption: Revenue lookup Id of replacement card
